page.title: 20Playground Game
page.content: Our most popular playground game is {Exie.}You start by using a counting rhyme to find who is IT.Once this is decided IT counts to ten while the others scatter and hide.After IT has counted he goes looking for the others.If IT sees one of the others he shouts "bang" and the person's name and that person must stay still.As IT moves away the other people run and try to get to the den without being seen.The people who are in the den make a chain to touch and free the people who are caught .The people who have made it home safely to the den can go out again without being seen also to free people.If everyone is caught the person who was caught first becomes IT.This game usualy takes a long time to complete.
